acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Nexachain's platform, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

eligibility.title: Eligibility
eligibility.item1: Be at least 18 years old or the age of majority in your jurisdiction
eligibility.item2: Have the legal capacity to enter into binding contracts
eligibility.item3: Not be restricted from using our services under applicable laws
eligibility.item4: Provide accurate and complete registration information

risks.title: Investment Risks
risks.content: Cryptocurrency investments carry inherent risks. Past performance does not guarantee future results. You should only invest amounts you can afford to lose. Nexachain provides investment opportunities but does not guarantee profits.

security.title: Account Security
security.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials. Notify us immediately of any unauthorized access. We are not liable for losses resulting from unauthorized account use.

deposits.title: Deposits and Withdrawals
deposits.item1: All deposits must be made using supported cryptocurrencies
deposits.item2: Deposits are confirmed within 24-48 hours after verification

referral.title: Referral Program
referral.content: Our referral program rewards users for referring new members. Referral bonuses are paid when referred users make their first deposit. Abuse of the referral system may result in account suspension.

prohibited.title: Prohibited Activities
prohibited.item1: Money laundering or financing illegal activities
prohibited.item2: Creating multiple accounts to abuse bonuses
prohibited.item4: Attempting to hack or disrupt our platform

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Nexachain is not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of our platform. This includes, but is not limited to, loss of profits, data, or cryptocurrency.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account at any time for violation of these terms or suspected fraudulent activity. Upon termination, you may withdraw your remaining balance subject to our verification process.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may update these terms at any time. Continued use of our platform after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms. Material changes will be communicated via email or platform notification.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: For questions about these terms, contact us at:

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.item1: To provide and improve our investment services
usage.item3: To verify your identity and prevent fraud
usage.item4: To communicate about your account and investments
usage.item6: To send promotional emails (with your consent)

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.intro: We do not sell your personal information. We may share information with:
sharing.item1: Service providers who assist in platform operations
sharing.item2: Legal authorities when required by law
sharing.item4: Business partners with your explicit consent

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures including encryption, secure servers, and regular security audits. However, no system is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve user experience, analyze platform usage, and remember your preferences. You can control cookie settings in your browser.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide services. Transaction records are kept for at least 7 years to comply with financial regulations.

international.title: International Transfers
international.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries outside your residence. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your data during international transfers.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our platform is not intended for individuals under 18 years old. We do not knowingly collect information from children. If we discover we have collected such information, we will delete it immediately.
